content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Catch your Breath You are slowed 2 until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Wrong Weapon If you made a thrown attack, you instead throw an object from your gear (determined randomly by the GM).

Ranged
Got too Close This attack grants and triggers a Grapple or Grab as a reaction by your enemy.

Unarmed
You made 'em Stronger The target gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #29
